item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis - Long term buy, short term hold
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis - Long term buy, short term hold

The technical setups posted below use simple trend detection, support and resistance, channels, pattern and candlestick analysis. We aim for high-probability trade setups on BTCUSD and use very few indicators. All charts use BNC's Bitcoin Liquid Index for maximum accuracy. The timeframe for trades is 1 to 7 days, so we'll use 4h candlesticks.

item.title: What exactly are sidechains? (blockchain)
item.description:
What exactly are sidechains? (blockchain)

My mother taught me that if someone hurts your family- you end them. When I was almost 5 years old going to Kindergarten in Hong Kong, my mom was surprised to see a red welt on my left cheek.

item.title: Colombian Colbitex Exchange Shuts Down Over Regulatory Concerns
item.description:
Colombian Colbitex Exchange Shuts Down Over Regulatory Concerns

South American Bitcoin exchanges are dealing with a lot of issues as of late. After SurBTC and SurBitcoin had to deal with problems earlier this year, Columbian exchange Colbitex was forced to shut down for the time being. According to the information, we have received, the local government is not too keen on this company.

item.description:
Which is the best ethereum wallet in india?

It may need to be reworded as a fully formed question, need spelling, grammar, or formatting improved (learn more about formatting on Quora), be ambiguous or difficult to understand, be too reliant on question details, be directed at a specific person, or overly verbose.

item.title: US Marshals announce $1.6 million bitcoin auction
item.description:
US Marshals announce $1.6 million bitcoin auction

The U.S. Marshals Service (USMS) recently announced a new bitcoin auction. Just over 2,719 bitcoins are to be sold to a single winner on Monday, 22 August. Worth about $1.6 million at current market rates, the coins come from "various federal criminal, civil and administrative cases," according to the Marshals Service.

item.title: Bitcoin Go! AR Geocaching Game Takara Lets You Collect Counterparty Tokens | Finance Magnates
item.description:
Bitcoin Go! AR Geocaching Game Takara Lets You Collect Counterparty Tokens | Finance Magnates

Takara, the first Bitcoin geocaching game for iOS devices, has added support for tokens thanks to Counterparty - the platform developing smart contracts for the Bitcoin blockchain. With the recent worldwide craze for mobile augmented reality gaming launched by Pok√©mon Go this may help introduce the value of cryptocurrency and blockchain assets to new people looking for prizes they can use beyond just a single app.

item.title: Australia's Postal Service Reveals 3 Blockchain Use-Cases
item.description:
Australia's Postal Service Reveals 3 Blockchain Use-Cases

According to Also read: Blythe Masters' Firm to Build ASX Blockchain, Raises $52 Million , the postal service in Australia is looking into developing blockchain platforms to ease into the global acceleration of digital identity services.

item.title: EB143 - Joey Krug: Augur - A Decentralized, Crowdsourced Prediction Market Built On Ethereum
item.description:
EB143 - Joey Krug: Augur - A Decentralized, Crowdsourced Prediction Market Built On Ethereum

Prediction markets are fascinating financial instruments which have proven to be accurate at making predictions on things like the outcome of elections, geopolitical events and sporting events. But in our heavily regulated financial world, they are the subject of much controversy.

item.title: Telegram Robot LARA Promises 3% Daily Returns on Bitcoin Deposits
item.description:
Telegram Robot LARA Promises 3% Daily Returns on Bitcoin Deposits

A newly launched automatic trust management system is inclined to offer attractive passive incomes to its investors. A newly launched automatic trust management system is inclined to offer attractive passive incomes to its investors. Titled Lara With Me - aka LARA - the project requires investors to add specific credits - from $10 to 20K - into their respective profiles.
